title: Kult
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Organic, Western, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Pub founded since 1989. Alternative atmosphere, has some vegetarian and vegan food marked on the menu. Dishes include chilli with soy 'beef,' vegetarian burger, pasta, and hotdog. The restaurant has board games for guests to play. Cozy atmosphere.
